infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: LinksAI needs camera access to track your golf ball trajectory.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: LinksAI needs your location to calculate ball landing position.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: LinksAI needs motion sensors to measure launch angle.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow LinksAI to access your camera to track golf balls.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow LinksAI to access your microphone.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow LinksAI to use your location to calculate ball landing position.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow LinksAI to use your location.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow LinksAI to use your location when the app is open.
